content: Setup: Supabase client, env vars, dark theme tokens, fonts, app shell structure
Auth flow: Login page with Supabase auth, MFA verification, session management
Dashboard: Balance overview, quick stats, recent transactions
Accounts: Fiat accounts list (EU + US Rails), account details with banking info
Transactions: Unified history with filters and search
Bottom tab navigation + page transitions + mobile shell
Payments: Create payment wizard + payees management
